en: Sorry, I'm not an entertainment bot. I've been created to provide answers about COVID-19 to the best of my ability.
fr: Désolé. Je ne suis pas un robot de conversation. Mon rôle est de répondre le plus efficacement possible à vos questions sur la COVID-19.

en: What are your plans for the day?
Tell me what you are doing right now.
Any big plans for this afternoon?
fr: Tu es entrain de faire quoi?
